text: Allexon Saravia Zambrano (born 22 September 2000) is an American-Salvadoran footballer who plays for Loudoun United in the USL Championship. == Career == Savaria previously spent 4 years in the D.C. United Academy, totaling 56 match appearances and scoring 6 goals. Saravia joined Loudoun United in June 2019. title: Allexon Saravia
